com_name: 文德福網絡服務有限公司
job_desc: Responsibilities:1. Handle the enquiries and provide the excellent after-sales service to the customers by online and telephone2. Report the enquiries and requests of the customers to the supervisors and related departments3. Ensure the system is operating normally and provide the appropriate suggestions to improve the systemRequirements:1. Fluent in English and excellent writing skill in both English & Chinese2. TOEFL score 600 or equivalent is a plus3. Basic computer skills 4. Hard working, dependable, patient, flexible and clarity of mind5. Excellent communication skill and team work6. Shift duty is required (including night shift)Benefits:1. Salary in training period = $30,000 2. Salary after training period = $35,000 - $43,000 3. Subsidyof $3,000 to $7,600 according to work and foreign language ability4. Fixed basic salary + performance bonus + monthly bonus + foreign language subsidy
job_req:
全職
